name: The Protector (FalseGodApophis)
description:
The Protector

A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46 Compo.

Protect the village by venturing out each day and collecting resources and fighting monsters. If the village runs out it will die. How many days can you keep it alive.

WASD to move

Mouse Aim for Combat

Gather the required resources each day so that when you rest for the night the village resources aren't negative.
